movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a warlord.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.overview: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.overview: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.overview: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.overview: T'Challa, the King of Wakanda, rises to the throne in the isolated, technologically advanced African nation.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.overview: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.overview: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

movies.title: A Quiet Place
movies.overview: A family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.overview: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend.

movies.title: It
movies.overview: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.overview: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.overview: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.overview: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

movies.title: Halloween
movies.overview: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital.

movies.title: The Ring
movies.overview: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.

movies.title: Insidious
movies.overview: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

movies.title: The Babadook
movies.overview: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled 'Mister Babadook' manifests in their home.

movies.title: Paranormal Activity
movies.overview: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.overview: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night.

movies.title: Superbad
movies.overview: Two high school boys want to throw a party before they graduate, but must navigate obstacles along the way.

movies.title: Step Brothers
movies.overview: Two middle-aged men become step brothers after their single parents marry.

movies.title: Anchorman
movies.overview: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated 1970s broadcasting.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.overview: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire, seeks restitution for his ruined rug.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber
movies.overview: Two dimwitted friends set out on a cross-country road trip to return a briefcase to its owner.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.overview: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

movies.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
movies.overview: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the principal thinks of that.

movies.title: Borat
movies.overview: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world.

movies.title: 21 Jump Street
movies.overview: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy.

movies.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
movies.overview: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never done the deed only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.overview: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.overview: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.overview: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Pride and Prejudice
movies.overview: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.overview: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

movies.title: A Star Is Born
movies.overview: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

movies.title: 500 Days of Summer
movies.overview: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.overview: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.title: The Fault in Our Stars
movies.overview: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

movies.title: Notting Hill
movies.overview: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

movies.title: When Harry Met Sally...
movies.overview: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

movies.title: Pretty Woman
movies.overview: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

movies.title: Crazy Rich Asians
movies.overview: This contemporary romantic comedy follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.overview: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.overview: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.overview: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.overview: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.overview: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
movies.overview: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

movies.title: The Fifth Element
movies.overview: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

movies.title: Minority Report
movies.overview: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
